# How to Warm Up Email for Cold Outreach

> ## Documentation Index
> Fetch the complete documentation index at: https://howtowarmupemail.com/llms.txt
> Use this file to discover all available pages before exploring further.

## Quick Answer

Warm up a new email domain by sending 10–20 emails per day in week 1, increasing by 10–15 emails per day each week, reaching full capacity of 50–100 emails per day after 3–4 weeks with proper DNS authentication.

---

# How to Warm Up Email for Cold Outreach

Warm up a new email domain by sending **10–20 emails per day in week 1**, increasing by 10–15 emails per day each week, reaching full capacity of **50–100 emails per day after 3–4 weeks** with proper DNS authentication.

## Warm-Up Schedule

| Week | Emails/Day | Inbox Rate Target |
|------|------------|-------------------|
| 1 | 10-20 | 70%+ |
| 2 | 20-40 | 80%+ |
| 3 | 40-70 | 85%+ |
| 4+ | 70-100 | 90%+ |

## Prerequisites

1. **SPF record** — authorize sending servers
2. **DKIM signing** — cryptographic email authentication
3. **DMARC policy** — specify handling of failed auth
4. **Custom tracking domain** — avoid shared domain reputation

---

### Email Warm-Up Step-by-Step: The Complete Guide for 2026
URL: https://howtowarmupemail.com/blog/email-warmup-step-by-step/

Week-by-week warm-up schedule. DNS setup (SPF, DKIM, DMARC). Engagement signals. Common mistakes to avoid.

---

### Automated vs Manual Email Warm-Up: Which Is Better?
URL: https://howtowarmupemail.com/blog/automated-vs-manual-warmup/

Automated tools: Lemwarm, Warmbox, Mailwarm compared. Manual warm-up pros/cons. Hybrid approach recommended.

---

### Email Warm-Up Deliverability Benchmarks: What Good Looks Like
URL: https://howtowarmupemail.com/blog/warmup-deliverability-benchmarks/

Benchmarks by week: Week 1: 70% inbox. Week 2: 80%. Week 3: 85%. Week 4+: 90%+. Warning signs to watch.

---

### Warm-Up Schedule Generator
URL: https://howtowarmupemail.com/tools/warmup-schedule-generator/

Generate custom warm-up schedule based on target volume and timeline.

---

### Warm-Up Progress Tracker
URL: https://howtowarmupemail.com/tools/warmup-progress-tracker/

Track warm-up progress against benchmarks, flag issues early.

---

### DNS Record Checker
URL: https://howtowarmupemail.com/tools/dns-record-checker/

Check SPF, DKIM, DMARC records for proper email authentication.
